name: Site Pet
short_description:
*Note: This stand alone program has been folded into the sitetools project and will no longer be updated here. It is still a stand alone utility but is part of a collection of tools now. You can find it here:
https://sourceforge.net/projects/sitetools/

sitepet: Ever get hit with an idea you'd like to add to your website at a later time? This utility allows you to append those ideas to a log file on your website so you can view them at any time.
summary: Append ideas to a website log via the command line
